content: Oh hey guys we're gonna use a computer for
the I'm working on a campaign and I found

saved and now I've got my word document to change it from portrait to landscape
and I'm going to insert the picture into the document and let's see I'll find it

the edge of the page because it has that border there and I'll just get it
centered and this is laser laser print so the paint won't make the ink run so
I'll print this up and we'll be ready for the next step now I've got some
golden brown paint I'm gonna water this up quite a bit I've also cut the edges
of the paper so it's a little rough on the edge okay so now it's kind of
saturating the paper just kind of go across and saturate the paper with the
water and the paint and you get that nice golden brown look now I'm gonna use
a reddish brown and kind of blend it into the edge of the paper and you can
see it looks a little dark at first but it starts to blend into the paper as the
paper is a bit wet because the golden brown has soaked into it okay so I got
that so now I'm going to do some features on the map I'll use the brown
I'll do some mountains I've got some forest areas stuff like that so that
really makes this areas kind of pop out of the map gives them some color okay so
now I'm gonna do the water - I'm gonna paint that in a darker shade and just go
all around and there's some islands I'll go around the islands and all that stuff
and so it really gives a nice separation to the map itself so really like that so
I'll put a little bit more in to get a little more detail that kind of thing I
do some darker areas in the water and getting a really nice-looking map there
so there we go we'll let this sucker dry and then we'll move on to the next step
so there we go alright cool here's our map
now here we go we're all dried up now one problem with the map is the the

use a super fine sharpie and just go over and start filling in the the areas
again the map that have lettering and that kind of
thing roads and lettering in that so here's the here's the the name of the

and fill in everything got some mountain those towns that kind of thing so we'll
just fill in the names and finish that up and then show you what it looks like
